Package Grupo45.Projeto

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
Grupo45.Projeto.GUI
public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
Date May 07-2021 This program is able to extract metrics from all .java files in a given source. It analyzes the code of java files for the metrics 'Lines of Code', 'Weighted Metric Count', 'Number of Class Methods' and 'Cyclomatic Complexity' creating a .xlsx file with the data. It has a Graphical User Interface that also shows the analyzed metrics and allows users to create rules for Code Smells evaluation. The GUI shows the detected code smells for the given rule, and has functionalities of rule manipulation. This is the the graphical user interface and the main class of the program
Version:
1.0
Author:
G45, Andre Amado, Guilherme Henriques, Jo√£o Guerra, Miguel Nunes, Francisco Mendes, Tiago Geraldo

    • addOpenButton

      public void addOpenButton()

      Adds apply button to secondary frame. When selected it applies the selected rule to a given excel file

      public void addModifyButton()
      Adds Modify button to secondary frame. When selected, it displays the selected Rule information in the GUI so it can be changed

      public void addDeleteButton()
      Adds delete button to secondary frame. When selected it deletes the selected rule

    • addExitAction

      public void addExitAction()
      Adds a window listener that saves all the active rules into a text file when the user closes the GUI

    • generateCodeSmellsQuality

      public void generateCodeSmellsQuality​(Rule rule)
      Generates a histogram with the quality of the Code Smells detected. Compares the Code Smells detected by this program with the ones detected by a professional at Code_Smells.xlsx, and calculates the true positive, true negative, false positivem and false negative
      Parameters:
      rule - is the Rule that will be checked for its Code Smells quality

    • addCheckCodeSmells

      public void addCheckCodeSmells()
      Adds the Check Smells button that when selected activates the method that generates the histogram

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when the Code_Smells.xlsx file is not found
